Skip to Content Hooters of N. Charleston Open • Closing at 11:00pm Order Online Order Catering Make Your Favorite Favorite 843-824-8661 2171 Northwoods Blvd. Charleston, SC, 29406 Get Directions Other Locations Store Hours Monday: 11:00am - 11:00pm Tuesday: 11:00am - 11:00pm Wednesday: 11:00am - 11:00pm Thursday: 11:00am - 11:00pm Friday: 11:00am - 12:00am Saturday: 11:00am - 12:00am Sunday: 11:00am - 11:00pm We know, even if you’re not into spicy, you’re into hot. That’s why all of our seriously craveable flavors are the best of the best. Wings, burgers, shrimp, all the things that make you drool. Location Highlights Hooters TV Delivery Gift Cards Carryout HootClub Rewards Smartphone Pay* Patio Seating Free WiFi *We accept smartphone payments from Apple Pay and Google Pay The Home of Ice Cold Brew Nothing goes with world-famous wings like a tall, frosty beer. That's why you can always count on us to quench your thirst with old favorites, or give you the opportunity to try something new. Fall Football Beers Come in for an ice-cold Bud, Bud Light, Stella or Dos Equis. They're our featured front line all season. Hooters is hiring! We’re looking for a few good men and a lot of great women to help make the world more fun! If you or someone you know is looking for flexible hours, competitive pay, tuition reimbursement, employee discounts and real opportunity to advance, you’re ready to join the ranks. View Jobs About Hooters of N. Charleston Enjoy world famous wings and a great beer selection at Hooters of N. Charleston. Eat-in or carryout, the best food in South Carolina can always be found right in Charleston. Daily happy hour specials, drink specials and craft beer on tap. Skip to Content A year flies by fast. Make it last with our 15-month swimsuit calendar, featuring 200 Hooters Girls from across the globe. Available Now! #2025HC If you can’t catch us on tour, you can still get to know the 2025 Hooters Calendar Girls by checking out #2025HC on Instagram and Twitter. We searched the globe to find the best. Over 200 Hooters Girls from across the world are chosen from thousands of candidates to grace the pages of our 15-month swimsuit calendar. When you buy a Hooters Calendar, we donate $1 toward the fight against breast cancer. With more than 17,000 Hooters Girls around the globe and a workforce made up of 70 percent women, Hooters is committed to raising awareness and funds for breast cancer research. That's something you can feel good about every day of the year, and extra good when it happens to be a Leap Year. 2025 Hooters Calendar Available Now! You're about to leave the Hooters website. The Department of Health Advises that eating raw or undercooked meat, poultry, eggs, or seafood poses a health risk to everyone, but especially the elderly, young children under age 4, pregnant women, and other highly susceptible individuals with compromised immune systems. Thorough cooking of such animal foods reduces the risk of illness. You're about to leave the Hooters website. Come Back Soon! if the page does not redirect you in seconds.
